description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Use strategy to pick the optimal defensive towers and place them effectively to keep your dreaded enemies from reaching your territory.  Towers have unique abilities and upgrades that can be used to create the perfect defense.  Try your skill against multiple levels that pit you against increasingly clever and difficult enemies.  Can you stop them all?
